tag_list: recruiter, executive-recruiter, headhunter, business-positions, finance, accounting, marketing, analytics, human-resources, operations, venture-backed-start-up, small-mid-sized-companies
overview:
Jeanmarie is an executive recruiter and founder of Spring Search Group. She has been recruiting at the professional / executive level since 2002.

Spring Search Group is an executive recruiting firm based in the San Francisco Bay Area. We provide recruiting services for rapidly growing, small and mid-sized companies. Our client base is comprised of venture-backed startups, private equity investments and rapid growth companies with $10M – $500M in revenues. We specialize in business positions including finance, accounting, marketing, analytics, human resources and operations.

Our Resources page provides valuable information on job search & employment topics and trends. We want you to be prepared as you’re job hunting or hiring in today’s market.

Want to know what articles fascinate us? Follow us on Twitter (SpringSearch), Facebook (Spring Search Group) and LinkedIn. We retweet and post pertinent information for hiring managers and job seekers.

Reach out and get to know us. We’d like to be a resource to you when filling your open positions. We’d also love to know your questions, comments, input on our articles, general thoughts or even a simple hello.
